content.question: In Liberty Leading the People, Eugène Delacroix included which of the following compositional elements to elicit the idea that freedom comes at a great cost?

choices.label: The battered French flag in the painting’s center
Liberty’s likeness to a well-known martyred rebel
Graphic depictions of the fallen and the wounded
Figures displaying uniformity of social class and status

content.answer: Graphic depictions of the fallen and the wounded

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
